attributes.action: Scrap the increase in air tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This new air tax increase is ridiculous as anyone who doesn't earn a lot of money cannot afford it. i can no longer afford to go on my holidays now.Also for my 18th birthday i thought id take my friends on holiday if this air tax still exists i can't afford to. these are my (personal) reasons for this petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
